mdRecord.dcterms:description: A doodle of a penis that appears to be expelling an unidentified liquid onto the word "Grades." Two not very legible names united by a plus sign (meaning and), with a date. 'I love you, Garcia Marquez' in Spanish, possibly referring to Colombian poet Gabriel Garcia Marquez. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
